00001 #ifndef UTILITY_MACROS_H
00002 #define UTILITY_MACROS_H
00003 #include "utility.h"
00004 #ifndef VX
00005 #include "strings.h"

00019 #define MY_VECTOR_GENERAL(name,nl,nh,type) \
00020   int priv_info_##name=0;                  \
00021   if ((nl)==1) priv_info_##name=1;         \
00022   type priv_##name[(nh)-(nl)+1+priv_info_##name];   \
00023   type *name=priv_##name;                           \
00024   bzero((void *)priv_##name, sizeof(type)*((nh)-(nl)+1+priv_info_##name));  \
00025   if ((nl)==1)                                      \
00026     name[0]=(nh)-(nl)+1;                            \
00027   if ((nl)!=1)                                      \
00028     name -= (nl);
00029 
00030 #define MY_VECTOR(name,nl,nh)                   \
00031   MY_VECTOR_GENERAL(name,nl,nh,double)
00032 
00033 #define MY_IVECTOR(name,nl,nh)                  \
00034   MY_VECTOR_GENERAL(name,nl,nh,int)
00035 
00036 #define MY_FVECTOR(name,nl,nh)                  \
00037   MY_VECTOR_GENERAL(name,nl,nh,float)
00038

00040 #define MY_MATRIX_GENERAL(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,type)    \
00041   int priv_info_##name=0;                               \
00042   if ((nrl)==1 && (ncl)==1) priv_info_##name=1;         \
00043   type *priv_##name[(nrh)-(nrl)+1+priv_info_##name];    \
00044   type **name=priv_##name;                              \
00045   type priv_info_mem_##name[N_MAT_INFO];                \
00046   if (priv_info_##name)                                 \
00047     {                                                   \
00048       name[0] = priv_info_mem_##name;                   \
00049       name[0][MAT_TYPE] = IS_FULL;                      \
00050       name[0][NR] = (nrh)-(nrl)+1;                      \
00051       name[0][NC] = (nch)-(ncl)+1;                      \
00052     } else                                              \
00053     name -= (nrl);                                      \
00054   int priv_i_##name;                                                    \
00055   int priv_size_##name=((nrh)-(nrl)+1)*((nch)-(ncl)+1);                 \
00056   type priv_mem_##name[priv_size_##name];                               \
00057   bzero((void *)priv_mem_##name, sizeof(type)*(priv_size_##name));      \
00058   for (priv_i_##name=(nrl); priv_i_##name<=(nrh); ++priv_i_##name)      \
00059     {                                                                   \
00060       name[priv_i_##name]=&(priv_mem_##name[(priv_i_##name-(nrl))*((nch)-(ncl)+1)]); \
00061       name[priv_i_##name]-=(ncl);                                       \
00062     }                                                                   
00063 
00064 #define MY_MATRIX(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch)                 \
00065   MY_MATRIX_GENERAL(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,double)
00066 
00067 #define MY_IMATRIX(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch)                \
00068   MY_MATRIX_GENERAL(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,int)
00069 
00070 #define MY_FMATRIX(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch)                \
00071   MY_MATRIX_GENERAL(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,float)
00072 
00073 
00074 /* MY_MATRIX_ARRAY declares an array of matrices on the stack */
00075 
00076 #define MY_MATRIX_ARRAY_GENERAL(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,arraySize,type) \
00077   int priv_info_##name=0;                               \
00078   if ((nrl)==1 && (ncl)==1) priv_info_##name=1;              \
00079   type **name[(arraySize)+1];                                \
00080   type *priv_array_mem_##name[((arraySize)+1)*((nrh)-(nrl)+1+priv_info_##name)]; \
00081   type priv_info_mem_##name[((arraySize)+1)*N_MAT_INFO];   \
00082   int priv_i_##name;                                         \
00083   int priv_j_##name;                                         \
00084   for (priv_i_##name=0; priv_i_##name<=(arraySize); ++priv_i_##name) \
00085     name[priv_i_##name] = &(priv_array_mem_##name[priv_i_##name*((nrh)-(nrl)+1+priv_info_##name)]); \
00086   if (priv_info_##name) {                                               \
00087     for (priv_i_##name=0; priv_i_##name<=(arraySize); ++priv_i_##name) { \
00088       name[priv_i_##name][0] = &(priv_info_mem_##name[N_MAT_INFO*(priv_i_##name)]); \
00089       name[priv_i_##name][0][MAT_TYPE] = IS_FULL;                       \
00090       name[priv_i_##name][0][NR] = (nrh)-(nrl)+1;                       \
00091       name[priv_i_##name][0][NC] = (nch)-(ncl)+1;                       \
00092     }                                                                   \
00093   } else {                                                              \
00094     for (priv_i_##name=0; priv_i_##name<=(arraySize); ++priv_i_##name)  \
00095       name[priv_i_##name] -= (nrl);                                     \
00096   }                                                                     \
00097   type priv_mem_##name[(arraySize)+1][((nrh)-(nrl)+1)*((nch)-(ncl)+1)]; \
00098   bzero((void *)priv_mem_##name, sizeof(type)*(((arraySize)+1)*((nrh)-(nrl)+1)*((nch)-(ncl)+1)));\
00099   for (priv_j_##name=0; priv_j_##name<=(arraySize); ++priv_j_##name) {  \
00100     for (priv_i_##name=(nrl); priv_i_##name<=(nrh); ++priv_i_##name) {  \
00101       name[priv_j_##name][priv_i_##name]=&(priv_mem_##name[priv_j_##name][(priv_i_##name-(nrl))*((nch)-(ncl)+1)]); \
00102       name[priv_j_##name][priv_i_##name]-=(ncl);                        \
00103     }                                                                   \
00104   }
00105 
00106 #define MY_MATRIX_ARRAY(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,arraySize) \
00107   MY_MATRIX_ARRAY_GENERAL(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,arraySize,double)
00108 
00109 #define MY_IMATRIX_ARRAY(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,arraySize) \
00110   MY_MATRIX_ARRAY_GENERAL(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,arraySize,int)
00111 
00112 #define MY_FMATRIX_ARRAY(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,arraySize) \
00113   MY_MATRIX_ARRAY_GENERAL(name,nrl,nrh,ncl,nch,arraySize,float)
